prompt:

For EACH market:
1. Estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY based on news context
2. Calculate EDGE vs market price
3. Only recommend trades with 10%+ edge


Market 1:
Title: Israel and Indonesia normalize relations by June 30, 2026?
Current Market Price: 83.4% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $729.69 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/israel-and-indonesia-normalize-relations-by

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
As of December 13, 2025, there have been no official announcements indicating that Israel and Indonesia will normalize diplomatic relations by June 30, 2026. Indonesia's Foreign Ministry has consistently stated that it will not establish diplomatic ties with Israel unless Israel first recognizes an independent and sovereign Palestinian state. Foreign Ministry spokesperson Yvonne Mewengkang reiterated this position on September 30, 2025, emphasizing that any vision regarding Israel must begin with recognition of Palestine’s independence. ([indonesiabusinesspost.com](https://indonesiabusinesspost.com/5351/geopolitics/fm-rules-out-normalization-with-israel-without-palestinian-recognition?utm_source=openai))

In May 2025, President Prabowo Subianto expressed Indonesia's readiness to establish diplomatic relations with Israel, provided that Israel recognizes a Palestinian state. During a joint press conference with French President Emmanuel Macron, Prabowo stated, "Indonesia has stated that

---

Market 2:
Title: Will Barack Obama be named in newly released Epstein files?
Current Market Price: 80.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $800.00 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/who-will-be-named-in-newly-released-epstein-files

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
As of December 13, 2025, there is no credible evidence linking former President Barack Obama to Jeffrey Epstein's activities. Recent releases of Epstein-related documents, including flight logs and visitor records, have not identified Obama as a visitor to Epstein's properties or as a passenger on his planes. Fact-checking organizations have consistently debunked claims suggesting such connections, emphasizing that these lists are fabricated and do not match official records. ([binghamtonherald.com](https://binghamtonherald.com/fact-check-no-official-public-epstein-documents-dont-name-joe-biden-and-barack-obama/?utm_source=openai))

The Epstein Files Transparency Act, signed into law by President Donald Trump on November 19, 2025, mandates the release of all unclassified documents related to Epstein by December 19, 2025. While this legislation aims to provide transparency, it is unlikely to reveal any new information implicating Obama, as previous investigations have found no evidence 

---

Market 3:
Title: Will Burnley FC win on 2025-12-13?
Current Market Price: 76.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $1,098.18 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/epl-bur-ful-2025-12-13

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
Burnley FC is set to face Fulham FC on Saturday, December 13, 2025, at Turf Moor. 

**Recent Form:**

- **Burnley FC:** Burnley has been struggling, losing their last five Premier League matches. ([sportpesajackpot.com](https://www.sportpesajackpot.com/burnley-vs-fulham-prediction-185730604/?utm_source=openai)) Their most recent defeat was a 2-1 loss to Newcastle United on December 6, 2025. ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/soccer/match/_/gameId/740741/burnley-newcastle-united?utm_source=openai))

- **Fulham FC:** Fulham has also faced challenges, losing their last two league matches, including a 2-1 home defeat to Crystal Palace on December 7, 2025. ([footballwhispers.com](https://footballwhispers.com/blog/burnley-vs-fulham-prediction-13-12-2025/?utm_source=openai))

**Team News:**

- **Burnley FC:** The team is dealing with defensive issues, with suspensions to key defenders Kyle Walker and Lucas Pires. Injuries have sidelined Zeki Amdouni, Jordan Beyer, Connor Roberts, and Bashir Hum

---


Provide predictions in the exact format specified.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.

IMPORTANT: For each market, you MUST estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY of the outcome.
Compare your probability estimate to the market price to find EDGE (mispricing).

Edge = Your Probability - Market Probability
- Positive edge on YES side means market undervalues YES
- Negative edge means market overvalues YES (bet NO instead)

For each market, provide your prediction in this EXACT format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Your Probability: [0-100]%
Market Price: [shown price]%
Edge: [+/-X]% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: [calculate: Edge × potential payout]
Reasoning: [1-2 sentences explaining your probability estimate]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES = Your probability > Market price + 10% (minimum 10% edge)
- NO = Your probability < Market price - 10%
- NO_TRADE = Edge < 10% (not enough value)

Be contrarian when you have conviction. Look for markets where news hasn't been priced in yet.
consensus_summary: All three AI models agree the market price for Israel-Indonesia normalization is vastly overconfident, recommending a "NO" trade with a significant perceived edge. There is unanimous consensus that Barack Obama is unlikely to be named in Epstein files, though one model abstains from a trade due to headline risk. For the Burnley match, all models also agree the market overvalues a win, favoring a "NO" bet based on the team's poor form.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Your Probability: 20%
Market Price: 83.4%
Edge: -63.4% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: +76.1% (Betting NO at 16.6% price implies ~6x payout; Edge magnitude indicates high value on NO)
Reasoning: Indonesia's official, reiterated position directly ties normalization to Palestinian statehood, a condition Israel is highly unlikely to meet by mid-2026, making the current market price vastly overconfident.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE
Your Probability: 15%
Market Price: 80.0%
Edge: -65.0% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: +78.0% (Betting NO at 20% price implies ~5x payout)
Reasoning: While credible evidence and fact-checks strongly indicate Obama will not be named, the imminent release of documents mandated by new law creates unpredictable headline risk, making the edge volatile and a precise trade less clear.

MARKET 3: NO
Your Probability: 40%
Market Price: 76.0%
Edge: -36.0% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: +43.2% (Betting NO at 24% price implies ~4.2x payout)
Reasoning: Burnley's poor form, key defensive absences, and the general unpredictability of a single football match mean a 76% implied probability for a win is significantly overstated.
